name: Harley Balabanian
tagline: Systems Design – Embedded Hardware – Software Dev
body:
## Contact

## Education

Queen’s University — Bachelor of Science in Engineering, Mechanical — 2009

Queen’s University — Bachelor of Arts, Computing — 2011

## Employment History
### 2011-2015 — Battlegrounds Live Gaming Inc. — Systems Engineer
* High-level electronic design
* Consumer products design for manufacture using Solidworks
* Manufacturing design: CNC milling, injection moulding, urethane plastics casting
* Network server development in Python and Twisted using Google Protocol Buffers
* Embedded systems software development in C++/Arduino

### 2011 — OpenConcept Consulting — Software Developer
* Development of Drupal-based websites with strong content management and localization features

### 2009 — Airsoft Innovations Inc. — Software Developer
* Creation of PHP/MySQL-based inventory and production management system

### 2008 — Faculty of Engineering at Queen's University — Software Developer
* Development of in-house PHP/MySQL-based content management system for students

### 2004-2006 — Carbon Computing — Senior Technician
* Diagnosis and repair of Apple desktop and notebook computers

## Volunteer and Extra-Curricular Involvement
* Queen’s University Marching Bands — 2007-2011 — Publicity Director during 2008-2009, 2010-2011 
* Queen's University Golden Words Newspaper — 2006-2011 — Webmaster and IT
* Queen's University Solar Car — 2008-2009 — Telemetry Team
* Queen's University Engineering Society — 2006-2007 — Webmaster Team

## Certification
Apple Certified Desktop and Portable Technician — 2003-2008 — Tech ID: CAN032GE

## Skills and Strengths
* Strong communication and interpersonal skills
* Very fast learner
* Excellent ability to tailor explanation and discussion of computer concepts to people with varying levels of knowledge, from novice to expert
* Avid cyclist and part-time bike mechanic
* Level 10 paladin
